questions.question: How can I reset my password?
response: To reset your password, go to the 'Forgot Password' page on our website and follow the instructions.
You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link and following the prompts.
To change your password, visit the 'Forgot Password' page and enter your email address to receive a reset link.

questions.question: What are your business hours?
response: Our business hours are from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM on weekdays.
Our office is operational from 9:00 AM until 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
response: You can reach our customer support team by calling our toll-free number at 1-800-123-4567.
To get in touch with customer support, send an email to support@example.com.
For assistance, contact our customer support department at 1-800-123-4567 or email us at support@example.com.
